## What is Rapier?

[Rapier](https://github.com/dimforge/rapier) is the 2D and 3D physics engines for the Rust programming language.

## Example

```{r bouncing_ball}
#| animation.hook: gifski
#| interval: !expr 1/60
#| device: ragg_png
#| 
library(rpr2dr)
library(ggplot2)

d <- bouncing_ball()
d <- d[1:200,]

for (i in seq_len(nrow(d))) {
  p <- ggplot(d[i, ]) +
    geom_point(aes(x, y), size = 10) +
    scale_size_identity() +
    coord_cartesian(ylim = c(0, 1))
  plot(p)
}
```
